result.html: Bhí stoirm annThere was a storm.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí stoirm annThere was a storm.

result.eng: If you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.
result.ga: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú é
result.orig: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú é
result.html: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú éIf you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫéann tú amaċ lá stoirme feicfiḋ tú éIf you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.

result.html: Scrios an stoirm gach rudThe storm destroyed everything.
result.ponchtml: Scrios an stoirm gaċ rudThe storm destroyed everything.

result.eng: After a stormy night I would go out on the beach.
result.ga: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an trá
result.orig: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an trá
result.html: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an tráAfter a stormy night I would go out on the beach.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis oíċe stoirme ṫéinnse amaċ ar an tráAfter a stormy night I would go out on the beach.

result.html: Tiocfaidh an stoirm go gastaThe storm will come quickly.
result.ponchtml: Tiocfaiḋ an stoirm go gastaThe storm will come quickly.
